resources.string: Watchdog for Sphero: Camera Motion Detected

With Watchdog for Sphero, you can position your Android device for surveillance of an area of your home, and whenever the camera detects any motion in that area, Sphero will roll towards the intruder with a challenge. Good fun for pets, friends, and family members, but don\'t rely on it to protect the family jewels :)
Position camera so that crosshairs are centered on area to be monitored, wake up your Sphero and place it in the center, then press Connect

Camera motion was detected, causing surveillance to end. Each time your Android device moves, the new camera position must be recalibrated. If you think this is being triggered in error, disable motion detection from the preferences menu.
1. Position your Android device\'s camera to monitor an area. If you don\'t have a phone holder, maybe you can build one out of plastic bricks?
2. Activate Sphero in the middle of the area being monitored.
3. Sit back and watch what happens when intruders enter!
Announce all watchdog activity out loud (using your Android device\'s current text-to-speech preferences).
The phrase to speak when an intruder is detected
Automatically stop surveillance when camera motion is detected
